dataQuery.sqlStatement: WITH T_CUSTOMER_INFO AS ( SELECT XVCH.COMPANY_FULL_NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME ,INVOICE_ADDRESS ,SHIPMENT_ADDRESS ,SHIPMENT_TEL ,CONTACTOR ,CONTACTOR_EMAIL ,REGION_CODE ,XOI.SHORT_NAME_ENG ,XOI.SHORT_NAME_CHT ,XOI.FULL_NAME_ENG ,XOI.FULL_NAME_CHT ,XOI.ADDRESS_ENG ,XOI.ADDRESS_CHT ,XOI.TEL_ENG as TEL_ENG ,XOI.TEL_CHT ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD-Mon-YYYY') AS INVOICE_DATE FROM APPS.Q_XXHPV_OQC_MAIN_V OQCM ,APPS.XXHPV_VENDOR_CUSTOMER_HEADERS XVCH ,APPS.XXHPV_ORGANIZATION_INFO XOI WHERE 1=1 ANDã€€OQCM.OQC_NOTIFY_NUMBER = :P_OQC_NUMBER AND XVCH.COMPANY_SHORT_NAME = OQCM.SHIPMENT_CUSTOMER AND XOI.ORG_CODE = (SELECT ORG_CODE FROM APPS.XXHPV_SO_HEADERS WHERE ORDER_NUMBER = OQCM.HIPPO_OQC_UNSHIP_SO_NUMBER) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) SELECT * FROM T_CUSTOMER_INFO

WITH T_SO_INFO AS ( SELECT XSH.CURRENCY ,XSH.PAYMENT_TERM ,XSH.SHIPMENT_TERM ,TO_CHAR(XSH.CREATION_DATE,'DD-Mon-YYYY') AS CREATION_DATE FROM APPS.XXHPV_SO_HEADERS XSH WHERE ORDER_NUMBER IN (SELECT HIPPO_OQC_CLIENT_UNSHIP_SO_NO FROM APPS.Q_XXHPV_OQC_PACKING_LIST_V WHERE OQC_NOTIFY_NUMBER = :P_OQC_NUMBER) AND ROWNUM =1 GROUP BY XSH.CURRENCY ,XSH.PAYMENT_TERM ,XSH.SHIPMENT_TERM ,XSH.CREATION_DATE )
,T_VALVE_DETAILS AS ( SELECT SO.ORDER_NUMBER ,SO.LINE_NUMBER ,SO.ITEM_ID ,SO.FLANGE_SPEC ,SO.DN_SIZE ,SO.BODY_MATERIAL ,CASE WHEN SO.PRODUCT_CATEGORY = 'BFLY' THEN 'Butterfly Valve' END AS ITEM_DESCRIPTION ,XIM.WEIGHT_KG as ITEM_WEIGHT FROM APPS.XXHPV_SALES_ORDER_SPEC_V SO ,apps.xxhpv_inv_master XIM WHERE ORDER_NUMBER IN (SELECT HIPPO_OQC_CLIENT_UNSHIP_SO_NO FROM APPS.Q_XXHPV_OQC_PACKING_LIST_V WHERE OQC_NOTIFY_NUMBER = :P_OQC_NUMBER) AND SO.PRODUCT_CATEGORY IS NOT NULL AND SO.ITEM_ID = XIM.ITEM_CODE GROUP BY SO.ORDER_NUMBER ,SO.LINE_NUMBER ,SO.ITEM_ID ,SO.FLANGE_SPEC ,SO.DN_SIZE ,SO.BODY_MATERIAL ,SO.PRODUCT_CATEGORY ,XIM.WEIGHT_KG ORDER BY SO.ORDER_NUMBER, SO.LINE_NUMBER )
,T_INV_DETAIL as ( SELECT OQCPL.CLIENT_PO_LINE_NUMBER AS PO_NUMBER ,OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_CLIENT_UNSHIP_SO_NO ,OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_UNSHIP_SO_LINE ,OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_PART_NUMBER AS ITEM_CODE ,OQCPL.NPS_SIZE AS SIZE_INCH ,SUM(OQCPL.SHIPMENT_QTY) AS SHIPMENT_QTY ,TVD.FLANGE_SPEC AS VALVE_CLASS ,TVD.DN_SIZE ,TVD.BODY_MATERIAL ,TVD.ITEM_DESCRIPTION ,TVD.ITEM_WEIGHT ,(SELECT SHIPMENT_CRATE_QTY FROM APPS.Q_XXHPV_OQC_MAIN_V OQCM WHERE 1=1 AND OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_CLIENT_UNSHIP_SO_NO = OQCM.HIPPO_OQC_UNSHIP_SO_NUMBER ) AS NUMBER_PKG ,(SELECT to_char(SHIPMENT_WEIGHT,'fm99,999') FROM APPS.Q_XXHPV_OQC_MAIN_V OQCM WHERE 1=1 AND OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_CLIENT_UNSHIP_SO_NO = OQCM.HIPPO_OQC_UNSHIP_SO_NUMBER ) AS SHIPMENT_WEIGHT ,(SELECT to_char(UNIT_PRICE,'fm99,999') FROM APPS.XXHPV_SO_LINES XSL WHERE 1=1 AND OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_CLIENT_UNSHIP_SO_NO = XSL.ORDER_NUMBER AND TO_NUMBER(OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_UNSHIP_SO_LINE) = TO_NUMBER(XSL.LINE_NUMBER) ) AS UNIT_PRICE ,(SELECT SUB_TOTAL FROM APPS.XXHPV_SO_LINES XSL WHERE 1=1 AND OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_CLIENT_UNSHIP_SO_NO = XSL.ORDER_NUMBER AND TO_NUMBER(OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_UNSHIP_SO_LINE) = TO_NUMBER(XSL.LINE_NUMBER) ) AS SUB_TOTAL ,(SELECT TAX FROM APPS.XXHPV_SO_LINES XSL WHERE 1=1 AND OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_CLIENT_UNSHIP_SO_NO = XSL.ORDER_NUMBER AND TO_NUMBER(OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_UNSHIP_SO_LINE) = TO_NUMBER(XSL.LINE_NUMBER) ) AS TAX ,(SELECT CURRENCY FROM T_SO_INFO ) AS CURRENCY ,(SELECT PAYMENT_TERM FROM T_SO_INFO ) AS PAYMENT_TERM ,(SELECT SHIPMENT_TERM FROM T_SO_INFO ) AS SHIPMENT_TERM ,(SELECT CREATION_DATE FROM T_SO_INFO ) AS CREATION_DATE FROM APPS.Q_XXHPV_OQC_PACKING_LIST_V OQCPL ,T_VALVE_DETAILS TVD WHERE 1=1 AND OQCPL.OQC_NOTIFY_NUMBER = :P_OQC_NUMBER AND OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_CLIENT_UNSHIP_SO_NO = TVD.ORDER_NUMBER AND to_number(OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_UNSHIP_SO_LINE) = to_number(TVD.LINE_NUMBER) GROUP BY OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_CLIENT_UNSHIP_SO_NO ,OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_UNSHIP_SO_LINE ,OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_PART_NUMBER ,OQCPL.SHIPMENT_CUSTOMER ,OQCPL.CLIENT_PO_LINE_NUMBER ,OQCPL.NPS_SIZE ,TVD.FLANGE_SPEC ,TVD.DN_SIZE ,TVD.BODY_MATERIAL ,TVD.ITEM_DESCRIPTION ,TVD.ITEM_WEIGHT ORDER BY OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_CLIENT_UNSHIP_SO_NO ,OQCPL.HIPPO_OQC_UNSHIP_SO_LINE )
, T_SUM as ( SELECT TID.* ,TID.SUB_TOTAL + TID.TAX as SUM_PRICES ,TID.ITEM_WEIGHT * TID.SHIPMENT_QTY as SUM_WEIGHT ,(SELECT SUM(SHIPMENT_QTY)FROM T_INV_DETAIL) as TOTAL_QUANTITY FROM T_INV_DETAIL TID WHERE 1=1 )
,T_SUM_SUM as ( SELECT SUM(T_SUM.SUM_PRICES) as TOTAL_PRICE ,SUM(T_SUM.SUM_WEIGHT) as TOTAL_WEIGHT FROM T_SUM WHERE 1=1 )
SELECT T_SUM.* ,(SELECT to_char(SUM_PRICES, 'fm99,999') FROM T_SUM_SUM )as SUM_PRICE ,(SELECT to_char(TOTAL_PRICE, 'fm99,999') FROM T_SUM_SUM ) as TOTAL_PRICE ,(SELECT to_char(TOTAL_WEIGHT,'fm99,999') FROM T_SUM_SUM) as TOTAL_WEIGHT FROM T_SUM
